DOC.brief_summary: to compare between Laparoscopic Guided Transversus Abdominis Plane Block and Trocar Site Infiltration as postoperative analgesia in Gynecologic Laparoscopic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Guided Transversus Abdominis Plane Block Versus Trocar Site Infiltration in Gynecologic Laparoscopy.
DOC.detailed_description: two groups of patients who are eligible for Gynecologic Laparoscopy were randomized to either Laparoscopic Guided Transversus Abdominis Plane Block or Trocar Site Infiltration at the end of the operation.
DOC.criteria: patients Need Gynecologic Laparoscopy Cardiac Chest disease Patient refuse participation
